template.name: Template RFC1213
template.description:
Template implementing a subset of the RFC1213-MIB, as expressed by a Mikrotik RouterOS device.
Copyright(c) 2019, Michael Mol. Use, modify and distribute freely under the terms of the MIT license.
Original version may be found here: https://github.com/mikemol/monitoring-templates.

trigger.name: IP Forwarding changed
trigger.description: IP forwarding state changed. It is presumed this is a rare enough event to be worth notice.
